body:
We should reopen this, still many functions have unnecessary .zero() calls on grad_input and grad_param, e.g.:
* `conv2d`: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/_functions/conv.py#L245
* `batch_norm`: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/_functions/batchnorm.py#L53
* most of the `auto` functions don't need it https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/_functions/thnn/auto.py#L163
